scripts.fix: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.migrate: doppler run -p backend -c dev -- npx node-pg-migrate -d POSTGRES_URL up
scripts.migrate-down: doppler run -p backend -c dev -- npx node-pg-migrate -d POSTGRES_URL down
scripts.migrate-stg: doppler run -p backend -c stg -- npx node-pg-migrate -d POSTGRES_URL up
scripts.migrate-prd: doppler run -p backend -c prd -- npx node-pg-migrate -d POSTGRES_URL up
scripts.db-types: doppler run -p backend -c dev -- sh -c 'npx supabase gen types --lang=typescript --db-url "$POSTGRES_URL" --schema public > src/datastore/types/generated.ts'
